question: Which country has formally re-joined the Paris Climate agreement recently?
explanation:
The United States of America has officially re-joined the Paris international climate pact recently. Earlier, the USA under the former President Donald Trumpâ€™s leadership quit from the agreement and remained outside the pact for 107 days.
With the change in government in USA led by Joe Biden, US decided to rejoin the Paris pact. Biden has set 2022 as the deadline for achievement of 2030 emission cuts as envisaged in the Paris pact.
